title: ModifyOperation
description: An operation that is part of a suggestion to modify the property of a node.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

target.description: The target property of each node to be modified.

value.description: The new value, or string patch, to apply to the target property.
